units.title: Fluorescent reporter construction
units.text: For the construction of a fluorescent reporter, an LGR5-mNeonGreen knock-in reporter was introduced into the last exon of LGR5 via electroporation, using previously published sgRNA (Sup-
units.rationale: Specifies the creation of a fluorescent reporter by electroporation.

units.title: sgRNA plasmid preparation
units.text: Two LGR5-targeting sgRNAs were cloned into SpCas9-equipped HP180 plasmids (a gift from Hui Yang lab), generating LGR5 sgRNA plasmids.
units.rationale: Details cloning of sgRNAs into Cas9 plasmids.

units.title: HDR template creation
units.text: HDR templates were made by replacing the CMV promoter in pBluescript II SK (+) (Addgene, #212205) with LGR5-P2AmNeonGreen sequence flanked by LGR5 homology arms using the Fast-Fusion™ Cloning Kit (GeneCopoeia).
units.rationale: Describes how the homology-directed repair template was assembled.

units.title: Co-electroporation into organoids
units.text: The LGR5 sgRNA plasmids and HDR template were co-electroporated into human intestinal organoids using a NEPA21 electroporator (Nepa Gene) following published methods45.
units.rationale: Explains delivery of editing components into organoids.

units.title: Colony picking and genotyping
units.text: Organoid colonies derived from single cells were manually picked, expanded, and genotyped.
units.rationale: Outlines isolation and verification of edited clones.

units.title: Crypt isolation (EDTA treatment)
units.text: The tissues were treated with 2.5 mM EDTA at 4 °C for 40 minutes to release crypts.
units.rationale: Provides the key step for releasing crypts from tissue.

units.title: Embedding crypts in BME droplets
units.text: The supernatant containing crypts was collected and embedded in Cultrex RGF BME (R&D Systems) droplets in 48-well plates (~50 crypts/well).
units.rationale: Describes how isolated crypts are embedded for culture.

units.title: Overlaying droplets with Y‑27632 medium
units.text: After solidification, droplets were overlaid with culture medium containing 10 μM Y-27632 (TargetMol).
units.rationale: Specifies the medium supplement used after embedding.

units.title: Differentiation to Paneth cells
units.text: Paneth cells. EGF (50 ng/mL), IGF-I (100 ng/mL), FGF-2 (50 ng/mL), DMH1 (2 μM), R-spondin1 CM (10%), Gastrin I (10 nM), A83-01 (0.5 μM), CHIR (4 μM), DAPT (10 μM), pVc (100 μg/mL) and IL-22 (2 ng/mL). Culture for 3 days.
units.rationale: Lists the medium composition and duration for inducing Paneth cells.

units.title: Differentiation to Goblet cells
units.text: Goblet cells. SJ000291942 (10 μM), R-spondin1 CM (10%), Gastrin I (10 nM), A83-01 (0.5 μM), CHIR (4 μM) and DAPT (10 μM) for 2 days and then replace CHIR with IWR-1 (2 μM) for 3 days.
units.rationale: Provides the stepwise media changes to generate Goblet cells.
